## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                           | Type      | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | ------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `name`    | `name`    | The item name.                        | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `visible` | `visible` | Whether the item is currently visible | `boolean` | `false`     |
